<a id="class_FileDialog"></a>

# FileDialog

**Inherits:** [ConfirmationDialog](class_confirmationdialog.md) **<** [AcceptDialog](class_acceptdialog.md) **<** [Window](class_window.md) **<** [Viewport](class_viewport.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A dialog for selecting files or directories in the filesystem.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**FileDialog** is a preset dialog used to choose files and directories in the filesystem. It supports filter masks. **FileDialog** automatically sets its window title according to the [file_mode](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_file_mode). If you want to use a custom title, disable this by setting [mode_overrides_title](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_mode_overrides_title) to ``false``.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Signals

<a id="class_FileDialog_signal_dir_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**dir_selected**\ (\ dir\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_signal_dir_selected)

Emitted when the user selects a directory.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_signal_file_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**file_selected**\ (\ path\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_signal_file_selected)

Emitted when the user selects a file by double-clicking it or pressing the **OK** button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_signal_filename_filter_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**filename_filter_changed**\ (\ filter\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_signal_filename_filter_changed)

Emitted when the filter for file names changes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_signal_files_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**files_selected**\ (\ paths\: [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_signal_files_selected)

Emitted when the user selects multiple files.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_FileDialog_FileMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **FileMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_FileDialog_FileMode)

<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_FILE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FileMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_FileMode) **FILE_MODE_OPEN_FILE** = `0`

The dialog allows selecting one, and only one file.<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_FILES"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FileMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_FileMode) **FILE_MODE_OPEN_FILES** = `1`

The dialog allows selecting multiple files.<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_DIR"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FileMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_FileMode) **FILE_MODE_OPEN_DIR** = `2`

The dialog only allows selecting a directory, disallowing the selection of any file.<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_ANY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FileMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_FileMode) **FILE_MODE_OPEN_ANY** = `3`

The dialog allows selecting one file or directory.<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_SAVE_FILE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[FileMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_FileMode) **FILE_MODE_SAVE_FILE** = `4`

The dialog will warn when a file exists.<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="enum_FileDialog_Access"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Access**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_FileDialog_Access)

<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_ACCESS_RESOURCES"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Access](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Access) **ACCESS_RESOURCES** = `0`

The dialog only allows accessing files under the [Resource](class_resource.md) path (``res://``).<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_ACCESS_USERDATA"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Access](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Access) **ACCESS_USERDATA** = `1`

The dialog only allows accessing files under user data path (``user://``).<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_ACCESS_FILESYSTEM"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Access](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Access) **ACCESS_FILESYSTEM** = `2`

The dialog allows accessing files on the whole file system.<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="enum_FileDialog_DisplayMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **DisplayMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_FileDialog_DisplayMode)

<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_DISPLAY_THUMBNAILS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DisplayMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_DisplayMode) **DISPLAY_THUMBNAILS** = `0`

The dialog displays files as a grid of thumbnails. Use [thumbnail_size](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_theme_constant_thumbnail_size) to adjust their size.<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_DISPLAY_LIST"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DisplayMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_DisplayMode) **DISPLAY_LIST** = `1`

The dialog displays files as a list of filenames.<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="enum_FileDialog_Customization"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Customization**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_FileDialog_Customization)

<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_CUSTOMIZATION_HIDDEN_FILES"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization) **CUSTOMIZATION_HIDDEN_FILES** = `0`

Toggles visibility of the favorite button, and the favorite list on the left side of the dialog.

Equivalent to [hidden_files_toggle_enabled](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_hidden_files_toggle_enabled).<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_CUSTOMIZATION_CREATE_FOLDER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization) **CUSTOMIZATION_CREATE_FOLDER** = `1`

If enabled, shows the button for creating new directories (when using [FILE_MODE_OPEN_DIR](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_DIR), [FILE_MODE_OPEN_ANY](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_ANY), or [FILE_MODE_SAVE_FILE](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_SAVE_FILE)).

Equivalent to [folder_creation_enabled](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_folder_creation_enabled).<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_CUSTOMIZATION_FILE_FILTER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization) **CUSTOMIZATION_FILE_FILTER** = `2`

If enabled, shows the toggle file filter button.

Equivalent to [file_filter_toggle_enabled](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_file_filter_toggle_enabled).<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_CUSTOMIZATION_FILE_SORT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization) **CUSTOMIZATION_FILE_SORT** = `3`

If enabled, shows the file sorting options button.

Equivalent to [file_sort_options_enabled](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_file_sort_options_enabled).<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_CUSTOMIZATION_FAVORITES"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization) **CUSTOMIZATION_FAVORITES** = `4`

If enabled, shows the toggle favorite button and favorite list on the left side of the dialog.

Equivalent to [favorites_enabled](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_favorites_enabled).<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_CUSTOMIZATION_RECENT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization) **CUSTOMIZATION_RECENT** = `5`

If enabled, shows the recent directories list on the left side of the dialog.

Equivalent to [recent_list_enabled](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_recent_list_enabled).<a id="class_FileDialog_constant_CUSTOMIZATION_LAYOUT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization) **CUSTOMIZATION_LAYOUT** = `6`

If enabled, shows the layout switch buttons (list/thumbnails).

Equivalent to [layout_toggle_enabled](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_layout_toggle_enabled).<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_access"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Access](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Access) **access** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_access)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_access**\ (\ value\: [Access](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Access)\ )
- [Access](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Access) **get_access**\ (\ )

The file system access scope.

\ **Warning:** In Web builds, FileDialog cannot access the host file system. In sandboxed Linux and macOS environments, [use_native_dialog](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_use_native_dialog) is automatically used to allow limited access to host file system.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_current_dir"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **current_dir** [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_current_dir)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_current_dir**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_current_dir**\ (\ )

The current working directory of the file dialog.

\ **Note:** For native file dialogs, this property is only treated as a hint and may not be respected by specific OS implementations.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_current_file"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **current_file** [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_current_file)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_current_file**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_current_file**\ (\ )

The currently selected file of the file dialog.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_current_path"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **current_path** [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_current_path)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_current_path**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_current_path**\ (\ )

The currently selected file path of the file dialog.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_display_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[DisplayMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_DisplayMode) **display_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_display_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_display_mode**\ (\ value\: [DisplayMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_DisplayMode)\ )
- [DisplayMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_DisplayMode) **get_display_mode**\ (\ )

Display mode of the dialog's file list.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_favorites_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **favorites_enabled** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_favorites_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

If ``true``, shows the toggle favorite button and favorite list on the left side of the dialog.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_file_filter_toggle_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **file_filter_toggle_enabled** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_file_filter_toggle_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

If ``true``, shows the toggle file filter button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_file_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[FileMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_FileMode) **file_mode** = `4` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_file_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_file_mode**\ (\ value\: [FileMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_FileMode)\ )
- [FileMode](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_FileMode) **get_file_mode**\ (\ )

The dialog's open or save mode, which affects the selection behavior.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_file_sort_options_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **file_sort_options_enabled** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_file_sort_options_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

If ``true``, shows the file sorting options button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_filename_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **filename_filter** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_filename_filter)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_filename_filter**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_filename_filter**\ (\ )

The filter for file names (case-insensitive). When set to a non-empty string, only files that contains the substring will be shown. [filename_filter](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_filename_filter) can be edited by the user with the filter button at the top of the file dialog.

See also [filters](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_filters), which should be used to restrict the file types that can be selected instead of [filename_filter](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_filename_filter) which is meant to be set by the user.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_filters"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **filters** = `PackedStringArray()` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_filters)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_filters**\ (\ value\: [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md)\ )
- [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **get_filters**\ (\ )

The available file type filters. Each filter string in the array should be formatted like this: ``*.png,*.jpg,*.jpeg;Image Files;image/png,image/jpeg``. The description text of the filter is optional and can be omitted. Both file extensions and MIME type should be always set.

\ **Note:** Embedded file dialog and Windows file dialog support only file extensions, while Android, Linux, and macOS file dialogs also support MIME types.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_folder_creation_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **folder_creation_enabled** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_folder_creation_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

If ``true``, shows the button for creating new directories (when using [FILE_MODE_OPEN_DIR](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_DIR), [FILE_MODE_OPEN_ANY](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_ANY), or [FILE_MODE_SAVE_FILE](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_SAVE_FILE)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_hidden_files_toggle_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **hidden_files_toggle_enabled** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_hidden_files_toggle_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

If ``true``, shows the toggle hidden files button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_layout_toggle_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **layout_toggle_enabled** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_layout_toggle_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

If ``true``, shows the layout switch buttons (list/thumbnails).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_mode_overrides_title"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **mode_overrides_title** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_mode_overrides_title)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_mode_overrides_title**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_mode_overriding_title**\ (\ )

If ``true``, changing the [file_mode](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_file_mode) property will set the window title accordingly (e.g. setting [file_mode](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_property_file_mode) to [FILE_MODE_OPEN_FILE](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_constant_FILE_MODE_OPEN_FILE) will change the window title to "Open a File").

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_option_count"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **option_count** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_option_count)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_option_count**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_option_count**\ (\ )

The number of additional [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md)\ s and [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md)\ es in the dialog.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_recent_list_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **recent_list_enabled** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_recent_list_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

If ``true``, shows the recent directories list on the left side of the dialog.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_root_subfolder"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **root_subfolder** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_root_subfolder)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_root_subfolder**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_root_subfolder**\ (\ )

If non-empty, the given sub-folder will be "root" of this **FileDialog**, i.e. user won't be able to go to its parent directory.

\ **Note:** This property is ignored by native file dialogs.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_show_hidden_files"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **show_hidden_files** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_show_hidden_files)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_show_hidden_files**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_showing_hidden_files**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the dialog will show hidden files.

\ **Note:** This property is ignored by native file dialogs on Android and Linux.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_property_use_native_dialog"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **use_native_dialog** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_property_use_native_dialog)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_native_dialog**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_use_native_dialog**\ (\ )

If ``true``, and if supported by the current [DisplayServer](class_displayserver.md), OS native dialog will be used instead of custom one.

\ **Note:** On Android, it is only supported for Android 10+ devices and when using [ACCESS_FILESYSTEM](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_constant_ACCESS_FILESYSTEM). For access mode [ACCESS_RESOURCES](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_constant_ACCESS_RESOURCES) and [ACCESS_USERDATA](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_constant_ACCESS_USERDATA), the system will fall back to custom FileDialog.

\ **Note:** On Linux and macOS, sandboxed apps always use native dialogs to access the host file system.

\ **Note:** On macOS, sandboxed apps will save security-scoped bookmarks to retain access to the opened folders across multiple sessions. Use [OS.get_granted_permissions()](class_os.md#class_OS_method_get_granted_permissions) to get a list of saved bookmarks.

\ **Note:** Native dialogs are isolated from the base process, file dialog properties can't be modified once the dialog is shown.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_add_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_filter**\ (\ filter\: [String](class_string.md), description\: [String](class_string.md) = ""\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_add_filter)

Adds a comma-separated file name `filter` option to the **FileDialog** with an optional `description`, which restricts what files can be picked.

A `filter` should be of the form ``"filename.extension"``, where filename and extension can be ``*`` to match any string. Filters starting with ``.`` (i.e. empty filenames) are not allowed.

For example, a `filter` of ``"*.png, *.jpg"`` and a `description` of ``"Images"`` results in filter text "Images (\*.png, \*.jpg)".

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_add_option"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_option**\ (\ name\: [String](class_string.md), values\: [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md), default_value_index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_add_option)

Adds an additional [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) to the file dialog. If `values` is empty, a [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) is added instead.

\ `default_value_index` should be an index of the value in the `values`. If `values` is empty it should be either ``1`` (checked), or ``0`` (unchecked).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_clear_filename_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_filename_filter**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_clear_filename_filter)

Clear the filter for file names.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_clear_filters"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_filters**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_clear_filters)

Clear all the added filters in the dialog.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_deselect_all"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **deselect_all**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_deselect_all)

Clear all currently selected items in the dialog.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_get_line_edit"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[LineEdit](class_lineedit.md) **get_line_edit**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_get_line_edit)

Returns the LineEdit for the selected file.

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [CanvasItem.visible](class_canvasitem.md#class_CanvasItem_property_visible) property.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_get_option_default"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_option_default**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_get_option_default)

Returns the default value index of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) or [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_get_option_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](class_string.md) **get_option_name**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_get_option_name)

Returns the name of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) or [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_get_option_values"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **get_option_values**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_get_option_values)

Returns an array of values of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_get_selected_options"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **get_selected_options**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_get_selected_options)

Returns a [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) with the selected values of the additional [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md)\ s and/or [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md)\ es. [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) keys are names and values are selected value indices.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_get_vbox"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[VBoxContainer](class_vboxcontainer.md) **get_vbox**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_get_vbox)

Returns the vertical box container of the dialog, custom controls can be added to it.

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [CanvasItem.visible](class_canvasitem.md#class_CanvasItem_property_visible) property.

\ **Note:** Changes to this node are ignored by native file dialogs, use [add_option()](class_filedialog.md#class_FileDialog_method_add_option) to add custom elements to the dialog instead.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_invalidate"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **invalidate**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_invalidate)

Invalidate and update the current dialog content list.

\ **Note:** This method does nothing on native file dialogs.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_is_customization_flag_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_is_customization_flag_enabled)

Returns ``true`` if the provided `flag` is enabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_set_customization_flag_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_customization_flag_enabled**\ (\ flag\: [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_set_customization_flag_enabled)

Toggles the specified customization `flag`, allowing to customize features available in this **FileDialog**. See [Customization](class_filedialog.md#enum_FileDialog_Customization) for options.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_set_option_default"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_option_default**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md), default_value_index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_set_option_default)

Sets the default value index of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) or [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_set_option_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_option_name**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md), name\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_set_option_name)

Sets the name of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) or [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_FileDialog_method_set_option_values"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_option_values**\ (\ option\: [int](class_int.md), values\: [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_method_set_option_values)

Sets the option values of the [OptionButton](class_optionbutton.md) with index `option`.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="class_FileDialog_theme_color_file_disabled_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

The color tint for disabled files (when the **FileDialog** is used in open folder mode).

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **toggle_hidden** [ðŸ”—](#class_FileDialog_theme_icon_toggle_hidden)

Custom icon for the toggle hidden button.
